name: cfsilent
description: Suppresses output produced by CFML within the body of the tag.

examples.title: Example for cfsilent tag
examples.description: Content within cfsilent tag will not be displayed
examples.code:
<cfset a = 10> 
 <cfset b = 5> 
 <cfsilent> 
    <cfoutput> This is from inside cfsilent #a+b# </cfoutput> 
 </cfsilent> 
 <cfoutput>This is from outside cfsilent #a-b#</cfoutput>
